content.rendered:
Personal Savings

Personal Savings

Our savings accounts offer the flexibility of savings for long or short periods of time. Whatever your savings goal may be, you can take advantage of automatic transfers from a Westamerica checking account as a convenient way to grow your savings. Your Community Banker will be pleased to help you select the best account for you.

related resources

  • Personal Schedule of Fees and Charges
  • Deposit Agreement and Disclosure
  • Patriot Act Policy
  • Money Market
  • Regular
  • Certificates of Deposit
  • Retirement Plans
  • Holiday Club

Money Market Savings

Westamerica Bank has the right account for you if you want to earn higher interest while maintaining easy access to your money without early withdrawal penalties.

  • Unlimited check writing with no per-item fee (limited by federal regulation).
  • No service charge with required balances.1
  • Earn interest with required balances.1
  • Enrollment in eStatements; otherwise $4.00.1
  • Higher interest rates on higher balances with tiered rate schedule.
  • No minimum amount per check.
  • Free personalized checks.
  • Convenient monthly statements.

1 For detailed information on balance requirements, activity requirements and fees, and customer eligibility, please see our Personal Schedule of Fees and Charges and Deposit Agreement and Disclosure.

Regular Savings

  • Unlimited check writing with no per-item fee (limited by federal regulation).
  • No service charge when balance requirements are met.1
  • Earn interest with required balances.1
  • Enrollment in eStatements; otherwise $4.00.1
  • Balance can be used as collateral for loans.
  • No excessive withdrawal fee with required balances.1
  • Quarterly statements (monthly with electronic funds transfer activity).

1 For detailed information on balance requirements, activity requirements and fees, and customer eligibility, please see our Personal Schedule of Fees and Charges and Deposit Agreement and Disclosure.

Certificates of Deposit

Lock in your rate for as few as seven days to as long as five years and get peace of mind with our FDIC-insured certificates.

  • If you want to lock in a higher interest rate, specify the term, and choose the frequency of interest payments.
  • No service charge when balance requirements are met.1
  • ​Earned interest with required balances.1
  • Balance can be used as loan collateral.
  • Interest can be sent to you by check, or deposited into your Westamerica Bank checking or savings account.
  • Interest can be automatically reinvested.

1 For detailed information on balance requirements, activity requirements and fees, and customer eligibility, please see our Personal Schedule of Fees and Charges and Deposit Agreement and Disclosure.

Retirement Plans

We offer a variety of accounts to help you save for a comfortable future, including Individual Retirement Accounts and Simplified Employee Pensions. 

Holiday Club

“Automatically” build a nest-egg for the holidays or for any special need.

  • If you want the advantage of saving “automatically” for the holidays.
  • No service charge when balance requirements are met.1
  • Earn interest with required balances.1
  • Make deposits automatically from your checking or savings account.
  • Account balance credited to you automatically in November.
  • Account renews automatically each year.

1 For detailed information on balance requirements, activity requirements and fees, and customer eligibility, please see our Personal Schedule of Fees and Charges and Deposit Agreement and Disclosure.
